goal.core.program.expressiongraph

Class ExpressionGraph.EmptyGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.program.expressiongraph.ExpressionGraph
      • goal.core.program.expressiongraph.ExpressionGraph.EmptyGraph
  • Enclosing class:
    ExpressionGraph

    public static class ExpressionGraph.EmptyGraph
extends ExpressionGraph
    Implementation of ExpressionGraph that does nothing. Any call to an add-method will be ignored, and all get-methods return an empty list.
    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addDefinition

        public void addDefinition(DatabaseFormula formula)
        Description copied from class: ExpressionGraph
        Adds a definition to this graph. The given formula may contain sub-expressions that are queries to other expressions; ExpressionGraph.addQuery(goal.core.kr.language.Query) will be called for those by this method.
        Specified by:
        addDefinition in class ExpressionGraph
        Parameters:
        formula - The formula to add to the graph as definition.

      • addQuery

        public void addQuery(Query query)
        Description copied from class: ExpressionGraph
        Adds a query to this graph. Queries will never contain any expression definition.
        Specified by:
        addQuery in class ExpressionGraph
        Parameters:
        query - The query to add.

      • addQuery

        public void addQuery(DatabaseFormula formula)
        Description copied from class: ExpressionGraph
        Adds a database formula to this graph as a query. It is assumed that this formula comes from the delete list of an action-specification post-condition, and thus only contains a single term.
        Specified by:
        addQuery in class ExpressionGraph
        Parameters:
        formula - The formula to add as query.

      • connectNodes

        public void connectNodes()
        Description copied from class: ExpressionGraph
        Parses the nodes in the graph, connecting usage nodes with their corresponding definition nodes.
        Specified by:
        connectNodes in class ExpressionGraph
